data.name: Colleen Wing
data.description: Colleen Wing is the Heroes for Hire Brawler, who deflects powerful attacks and counters with her lightning-fast katana.

starItems.name: Colleen Wing
starItems.description: Colleen Wing is the Heroes for Hire Brawler, who deflects powerful attacks and counters with her lightning-fast katana.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, when this character performs a Counterattack or Assist, apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> instead.

If Misty Knight is an ally, this attack cannot be dodged.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>70%</color> damage + apply <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
This attack gains +<color=#86e619>30%</color> piercing for each <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> ally.
Gain <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, this attack targets the enemy with the highest damage instead of the primary target, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> and gains <color=#86e619>+1,000%</color> Extra Focus.

If Misty Knight is an ally, this attack cannot be dodged.

If Misty Knight is an ally, this attack cannot be dodged.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, this attack targets the enemy with the highest damage instead of the primary target, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> and gains <color=#86e619>+1,000%</color> Extra Focus.

1.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing.
If any target is a <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color>, attack that target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> instead.
Apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> to all enemies.
Gain <color=#86e619>+1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

If Misty Knight is an ally, this attack cannot be dodged.

2.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>110%</color> Piercing.
If any target is a <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color>, attack that target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> instead.
Apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> to all enemies.
Gain <color=#86e619>+1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

If Misty Knight is an ally, this attack cannot be dodged.

4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to all enemies
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to all enemy <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color>

5.description:

Gain <color=#86e619>+1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

If Misty Knight is an ally, this attack cannot be dodged.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all enemies

7.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>300%</color> Piercing.
If any target is a <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color>, attack that target for <color=#86e619>400%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> instead.
Apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all enemies.
Gain <color=#86e619>+1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

If Misty Knight is an ally, this attack cannot be dodged.

1.description:
At the start of any <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, if this character is on <color=#fff568>DEFENSE</color> and has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on Spawn of their initial match. This action occurs only once per <color=#fff568>WAR</color>.

At the end of any turn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color> and below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, clear all negative effects, heal for <color=#86e619>100%</color> of this character's Max Health, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns, <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, and <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.
On end of any <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> ally turn, <color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to attack the most injured non-summoned enemy, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing for each <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> ally. On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, this attack always occurs and gain <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> for self.

On Death, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, <color=#fff568>Revive</color> with <color=#86e619>100%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Piercing.
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage, +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage Reduction, and +<color=#86e619>175%</color> Resistance per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
On Turn, gain <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> + apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to an ally Misty Knight
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Piercing

2.description:
At the start of any <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, if this character is on <color=#fff568>DEFENSE</color> and has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on Spawn of their initial match. This action occurs only once per <color=#fff568>WAR</color>.

On Turn, gain <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> + apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to an ally Misty Knight.
At the end of any turn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color> and below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, clear all negative effects, heal for <color=#86e619>100%</color> of this character's Max Health, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns, <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, and <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.
On end of any <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> ally turn, <color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to attack the most injured non-summoned enemy, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing for each <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> ally. On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, this attack always occurs and gain <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> for self.

On Death, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, <color=#fff568>Revive</color> with <color=#86e619>100%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing.
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage, +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage Reduction, and +<color=#86e619>175%</color> Resistance per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
2.nextUpgrade:
On enemy Death, if this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to all enemies
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Piercing

3.description:
At the start of any <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, if this character is on <color=#fff568>DEFENSE</color> and has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on Spawn of their initial match. This action occurs only once per <color=#fff568>WAR</color>.

On Turn, gain <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> + apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to an ally Misty Knight.
At the end of any turn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color> and below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, clear all negative effects, heal for <color=#86e619>100%</color> of this character's Max Health, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns, <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, and <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.
On end of any <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> ally turn, <color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to attack the most injured non-summoned enemy, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing for each <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> ally. On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, this attack always occurs and gain <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> for self.

On Death, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, <color=#fff568>Revive</color> with <color=#86e619>100%</color> of this character's Max Health. On enemy Death, if this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to all enemies.

Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Piercing.
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage, +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage Reduction, and +<color=#86e619>175%</color> Resistance per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Piercing
<color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing

4.description:
At the start of any <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, if this character is on <color=#fff568>DEFENSE</color> and has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on Spawn of their initial match. This action occurs only once per <color=#fff568>WAR</color>.

On Turn, gain <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> + apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to an ally Misty Knight.
At the end of any turn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color> and below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, clear all negative effects, heal for <color=#86e619>100%</color> of this character's Max Health, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns, <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, and <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, this attack always occurs and gain <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> for self.

On Death, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, <color=#fff568>Revive</color> with <color=#86e619>100%</color> of this character's Max Health. On enemy Death, if this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to all enemies.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing. <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing.
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage, +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage Reduction, and +<color=#86e619>175%</color> Resistance per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to most injured enemy
While this character has <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> chance to Counterattack and gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Block Amount
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing

5.description:
At the start of any <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, if this character is on <color=#fff568>DEFENSE</color> and has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>HEROES FOR HIRE</color> allies, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on Spawn of their initial match. This action occurs only once per <color=#fff568>WAR</color>.

On Turn, gain <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> + apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to an ally Misty Knight.
At the end of any turn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color> and below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, clear all negative effects, heal for <color=#86e619>100%</color> of this character's Max Health, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns, <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, and <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.
